product_name: Patagonia Baby Capilene 1 Silkweight Shirt - Infant/Toddler Girls'
long_description: The breathable and fast-drying Patagonia Baby Capilene 1 Silkweight Shirt helps keep your infant or toddler girl comfortable and protected from the sun. Made of 59% polyester, 35% recycled polyester and 6% spandex, it has 50+ UPF sun protection and Polygiene(R) permanent odor control. Raglan silhouette is detailed with a stretchy rib-knit neck for easy on/off; side panels extend through the underarms and sleeves for mobility and comfort. The Patagonia Baby Capilene 1 Silkweight Shirt features flatseam construction throughout to help prevent chafing.
short_description: The breathable and fast-drying Patagonia Baby Capilene 1 Silkweight Shirt helps keep your infant or toddler girl comfortable and protected from the sun.
